thread.section_title: AMR Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AMR | amr.com.au
thread.title: Kim Astell-Raper

author: Kim Astell-Raper
title: Kim Astell-Raper
text:
i have made a few orders with AMR, one of them i had an order sent twice but the lovely Sia in their customer service team, reasured me i wasn't charged twice and offered to collect the extra items or let me keep them for free, she was so apologetic and helpful.
i also had an order where an item was out of stock, and Sia again made sure i was refunded and advised me when the item might be in stock again,
couldn't recommend them enough, great range of items, and they sell to people who are not trade, where as other sites you cant buy anything unless you are trade which is just not fair. i will be a customer with AMR for a long time.
